__TOC__

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/GediminasPaulauskas/MyApplication|My application]]</nowiki> to become the maintainer of Zope in Ubuntu was accepted.

Following is a list of source packages I want to maintain. Many packages were already in Maverick, see <nowiki>[[attachment:zope_packages_in_maverick.txt]]</nowiki>. New <nowiki>[[Zope-Natty]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[SchoolTool-Natty]]</nowiki> packages have been uploaded by sponsors for <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/testing/natty/alpha3|Natty Alpha 3]]</nowiki>. I still need <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuDevelopers#Per-package Uploaders|PPU]]</nowiki> rights granted for <nowiki>[[attachment:zope-new-packages-in-natty.txt]]</nowiki>.
